text: 26.20 Mat 3.8, Apo 9.20, 9.28-29, 11.26, 13.14 Taun Damaskus amɨl, binɨb anɨb okok kɨlop God takaw tep ak agñɨnek agak. Kɨdek amɨl Jelusalem binɨb kɨlop agñɨl, Judiya binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop agñɨl, binɨb Juda mel man okok agñɨl gɨnek agak. Kɨlop agñɨl agɨnek, Nɨbi tap si tap tɨmel gɨpun ak taynen anɨgɨpun agɨl kelɨgɨnɨmɨb agɨnek agak. Kelɨgɨl, adɨkɨd God nop gos nɨŋɨd, gos teplep pal ak kɨdek gɨnɨmɨb agɨnek agak. Kɨdek gem, nɨbi God yɨl opɨm agɨl nɨgɨnɨgabal agɨnek agak
